description: By replacing the sticky keys executable with the local admins CMD executable, an attacker is able to access a privileged windows console session without authenticating to the system. When the sticky keys are "activated" the privilleged shell is launched. Author: Sreeman. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Using Sticky-keys To Obtain Unauthenticated, Privileged Console Access
